text: Vasco Regini (born 9 September 1990) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a left-back for Sampdoria. ==Club career== Regini made his Serie A debut for Sampdoria on 9 May 2009 in a game against Reggina. He was successively acquired on loan by Lega Pro Prima Divisione club Foggia later in August 2010. On 31 January 2020, he joined Parma on loan. ==International career== Regini was a member of Italy U-20 team from 2008 to 2011. In 2011–12 season he played twice for Italy under-21 Serie B representative team plus another unofficial charity match against Italy U20. All three match Regini was the captain. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|League
